firefox.notes: See bug 928150. Firefox also supports the experimental and prefixed properties mozCurrentTransform and mozCurrentTransformInverse which set or get the current (inverse) transformation matrix.

Since Firefox 5, getImageData now correctly accepts rectangles that extend beyond the bounds of the canvas; pixels outside the canvas are returned as transparent black and now also returns at least one pixel's worth of image data if a rectangle smaller than one pixel is specified.

firefox_android.notes: Since Firefox 5, getImageData now correctly accepts rectangles that extend beyond the bounds of the canvas; pixels outside the canvas are returned as transparent black and now also returns at least one pixel's worth of image data if a rectangle smaller than one pixel is specified.
